titleStmt.title: A secular sermon concerning the doctrine of the Gospell by the goodnes and power of God restored in the fifteenth age from the birth of our Lord Iesus Christ. Made by the reuerend and worthy precher Mr. Abraham Scultetus, in the High-dutch tongue. After by another translated into Latin, and now out of Latin into English
titleStmt.author: Scultetus, Abraham, 1566-1624.

titleStmt.title: A secular sermon concerning the doctrine of the Gospell by the goodnes and power of God restored in the fifteenth age from the birth of our Lord Iesus Christ. Made by the reuerend and worthy precher Mr. Abraham Scultetus, in the High-dutch tongue. After by another translated into Latin, and now out of Latin into English
titleStmt.author: Scultetus, Abraham, 1566-1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iones, dwelling in Red-crosse streete neare S. Giles Church,

notesStmt.note: A translation, of the Latin translation by Christian Kyfert, of an untraced work.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
Some print show-through, and some leaves cropped at head; beginning-page 17 from Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.) Library copy spliced at end.
